content.rendered:

Balconies
Gates
Railings
Handrails
Staircases & Balustrades

Big Ferro have been designing, supplying and installing metal staircases for both the commercial and residential sectors for a number of years. Our experienced team are fully certified and insured. We have experience in creating metal staircases of all styles, including but not limited to; spiral staircases, indoor metal staircases, outdoor metal staircases, emergency fire exits and more. A metal staircase can be an incredibly versatile choice for your business or home. Our metal staircases are highly customizable and can be designed entirely to your specifications. View our portfolio below for examples of our work.

Big Ferro Creations Showcase gallery

info@bigferro.co.uk
02089642857
info@bigferro.co.uk
02089642857

Metal staircases are especially useful for external fire escapes, and emergency exits in high rise buildings or commercial units. The durable nature of metal makes it well adapt at handling natural elements, while still maintaining its attractive appearance. As well as this, we ensure that our metal staircases can deal with a high level of foot traffic in busy areas to ensure their longevity. Below are just some of the options of metal staircase we offer.

Metal Spiral Staircase are a perfect solution for small spaces and add a beautiful ambience to any home or business. Our spiral staircases can be made to measure in a bespoke decorative design that matches your individual specification, allowing it to be a statement piece in any home or place of business.

Emergency Fire Escapes. All of our external staircases are made to be weather and weight resistant in order to withstand high pressures and to ensure they maintain their structural integrity. Our metalwork goes through vigorous testing.

Indoor straight staircase are an affordable option as well as a practical option. Our metal staircases can be installed quickly and easily, causing as little disruption to you or your business as possible. Our staircases provide high-quality design without breaking the bank.
